Text:
Post it on a UI website, idiot.


Until you do so, this is a keylogger/virus, making you a piece of shit.
Do you know anything about wow ui's Ripture? i dont think you do, so hush push on you. instead of whining, stay quiet. im sure santa will visit you this year then.

As a matter of fact, I do.  I'm glad you are trying to "smite" me and divert attention from the fact that you are attempting to torrent more viruses.

If you gave 2 shits about your "ui", you would post it on a real site, and give screenshots, and a much more thorough description so people know what they are downloading. 

But you aren't going to, because they wont let you upload a virus to their site.  So you are just going to peddle your idiocy here instead.  Shame.
Upload it to a real site and provide real screenshots and full list of all included addons and versions and I will retract everything I've said.
